ma niyojanaya karanu labana mathiwarana bala pradeshaya wana bulathsinhala aasanaye aasana sanwidhayaka dhurayen illa aswima sambandhawayi. 2002 warshaye mathugama pradeshiya sabhawe eksath jathika pakshaye sabhapathiwaraya lesa kriyakari deshapalanayata piwisi ma janathawage sithum pathum therumgena kapakirimen katayuthu kala nisa palath sabha manthriwarayeku lesa thunwarak da mathugama hitapu aasana sanwidhayaka kaluthara disthrik nayaka amathya mahinda samarasinha mahatha eksath jathika pakshaya haragiya awasthawedi pawathi palath palana mathiwaranayata apekshakayan soyagatha nohaki awasthawedi ma palath sabhawen kondesi wirahithawa iwath wi palath palana mathiwaranayata tharaga kara manapa chanda 11900k labagena pradeshiya sabhawe wipaksha nayakawaraya lesa pathwiya.palathsabha manthriwarayeku hatiyata pakshaya wenuwen siragatha wi sitiyadi parlimenthu mathiwaranayata tharaga kara eksath jathika pakshayen disthrikkaye palamuwaniya lesa pathwiya.pasugiya parlimenthu mathiwaranayedi manapa 118128k(eklaksha dahaatadahas ekasiya wisi atak) labagena nawatha kaluthara disthrikkaye eksath jathika paksha manthriwarayeku lesa theri pathwiya.2006.10.26 dina sita mathugama aasanaye eksath jathika pakshaye aasana sanwidhayakawaraya lesa pathwima laba sanwidhana katayuthu sidukirimata sidu wuye kaluthara disthrikkaye siti eksath jathika paksha prabalayin waradana waraprasada walata pakshaya harada yaddi jiwithaya pawa paraduwata thaba naduhaba walata patali awurudu ganan sirabath kamin wishala kapakirimak kara pakshikayan aaraksha kirimata siduwiya.pakshaya wisin bharadun mathugama aasanaye sanwidhayaka dhuraye wagakima ma wisin nisiyakarawa itukirime sahathikaya mathugama aasanaye janathawa mata labadunne mathugama aasana sanwidhayaka dhurayen ma iwath kara kotipathi wyaparayeku sanwidhayaka lesa pathkara, ohu parlimenthu mathiwaranayata idiripath wi koti ganan wiyadam karaddi satha pahak wiyadam nokara mathugama aasanaye ma wisin sthana thunaka pamanak wathu raswim thunak pawathwa manapa 28402k labagena mathugama aasanaye palamuwaniya hatiyata dinuwemi.inpasu ma hata aasana sanwidhayaka dhuraya labadunne kaluthara disthrikkaye bhumi pramanaya wadi chanda adu kaluthara disthrikkaye dushkarama aasanaya wana bulathsinhala aasanayayi.bulathsinhala aasanaye sanwidhayaka dhuraya ma hata labadena wita mulu aasanayema chanda prathishathaya 8000ta basa thibuni.shri lanka nidahas pakshaye chanda prathishathaya 38000 dakwa nagi thibuni.ema awasthawe sanwidhayaka dhuraye pathwim lipiya ma bhara nogaththath pakshayata karana yuthukamak hatiyata pasugiya janadhipathiwaranayedi bulathsinhala aasanaye sanwidhayaka katayuthu itha ihalin itu kalemi.mema warshaye da bulathsinhala aasanaye sanwidhayaka dhura pathwim lipiya bhara nogaththath pawathi palath palana mathiwaranayedi pakshaya jayagrahanaya karadimata uparima kapakirimak sidu karana ladi.namuth pakshayak hatiyata pakshikayinge dawena prashna walata wisadum labadimata katayuthu nokirima nisa ehi daduwama 2018 pebarawari 10 dina poduwe apa hamata widimata sidu wiya.
